## Installation
To install the package from the CRAN:
```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("survRM2")
```

## Development version
To install the development version of the survRM2 (a bug fix version):
```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("uno1lab/survRM2")
```

### Bug fix
* 2020-06-28: Fixed an error that appeared when 'tt0max' and 'tt1max' were the same value.
